title: Where to report an account theft
body:
Hello,

I would like to ask where to report an account theft. I successfully recovered my account and he told me he will return this account because reported me too. I have some kind of evidence but don't know where to report them. Support section does not have such category.

I will be really grateful if you can help me.

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team will take a look.  I'm glad that you've been able to recover your account in the meantime, though.  We'll be able to take a closer look with any info you provide through your ticket, so we'll see you there!
